name: Helikopterine
description:
a few weeks ago, the MOA Globe in the Philippines was reported to be missing, or stolen, basically it was GONE. now where could it possibly go? yep, you're seeing it. you're using the globe to participate in Team Seas. now go clean up the ocean(s) and make profit, will ya?

- - CONTROLS - -

WASD - Movement

TAB - Reveal Upgrades

LMB - Klik on Cards or Buttons

- - CREDITS TO AUDIO ASSETS - -

Underwater Ambience by Fission9

Ocean Waves by Noted451

Helicopter Sound by Amaida1

Water Swirl by InspectorJ

this game was made for the Sea Jam 2021.

== gibberish section ==

had fun being tempted in making this, it was a journey of 80% procrastination and the rest is cramming it until 3:00 am in the morning.

any feedback and constructive criticisms are highly appreciated. :D
